column2: assists_df <- data.frame(totalxA = sapply(teams, function(team) sum(team$xA*team$Matches)), Assists = sapply(teams, function(team) sum(team$Assists)), Passes = sapply(teams, function(team) sum(team$Passes_Attempted)), Names = names(teams))
ggplot(assists_df, aes(area = Assists, fill = totalxA, label = Names)) +
labs(title = "Treemap of Club by Total xA and Assists", fill = "Total xA")
